name: Celebi
author: Shin Nagasawa
flavor_text: It has the power to travel across time, but it is said to appear only in peaceful times.

ancient_trait.name: θ  Stop
ancient_trait.effect: Prevent all effects of your opponent’s Pokémon’s Abilities done to this Pokémon.

abilities.name: Leap Through Time
abilities.effect: When this Pokémon is Knocked Out, flip a coin. If heads, shuffle this Pokémon and all cards attached to it into your deck, and your opponent can’t take any Prize cards for it.

attacks.name: Sparkle Motion
attacks.effect: Put 1 damage counter on each of your opponent’s Pokémon.
